item.title: Road needs speed bumps!!!, 15th September
item.description:
This road is blighted by cars and trucks driving extremely fast. Because it is the only road that crosses the railway track and is therefore one of the only ways to get from 'north to south' in this part of Nunhead it tends to be quite busy. The nascence of speed bumps means that drivers tear up and down it at pretty dangerous speeds. For some reason it is one of the only roads in the immediate vicinity that does not have speed bumps. Please can some be put in before someone is hurt? Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gibbon Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public health risk : Persistent leak of foul water from the undercroft of the building into public circulation area, 15th September
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hackney Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Vehicle Parked in Loading Bay, 15th September
item.description:
Attached images show vehicle parked in Loading bay, has a blue badge but has been there longer than the three hours allowed. Public house next to the loading bay is unable to receive some deliveries without access to the loading bay as located on on red route. CCTV from the public house shows the same vehicle parked in the loading bay from 8am till 4pm on Friday the 12th of September, Tuesday the 9th of September prohibiting its use for deliveries and other users.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montford Place, Oval, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree branches impeding pedestrians, 15th September
item.description:
This small tree has low branches at around 1.5m, causing pedestrians to either duck down or walk in the road! This is especially problematic if you have a child in a stroller or have mobility issues.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langdon Road, Widmore, London
